overview: A famous rural playboy teacher and a Russian wife Grande is already in a deep affair. The two, who were trying to avoid her husband's eyes and bring a thrilling meeting, eventually get caught by the husband, and he who loves Grande so much, cannot bear to be angry with Grande. In the end, he wants to take revenge by persuading the teacher's girlfriend, Soon-sil, a fool in the neighborhood to have sex with him.
title: International Affair
